message.content:
I need to identify the line item representing the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is typically the "Depreciation" line item in a cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see there is a line item called "Depreciation" with an amount of 91,498.88 on 2024-02-05.

Depreciation represents the systematic allocation of the cost of tangible assets over their useful life, which matches exactly what the task is asking for.

Therefore, the value of the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount is 91,498.88.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '91498.88'} }
```
